comments.body: Maybe above this mention how this can be used for golden file testing, and then a `See also...` section that links the related docs, like GoldenFileComparator etc.

I added "See also" to GoldenFileComparator, but I don't know what you mean by mentioning "how this can be used for golden file testing", since the doc mentioned golden testing in the 4th step as well as the snippet. Can you give an example?
Oh right! That should do then! Thanks!
